Type.Name: CryptoConfig

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CryptoConfig extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.summary: Cryptographic configuration class to access the default and overidden (machine.config) configuration settings.
Docs.remarks: The file "machine.config" can be used to change the framework default algorithm implementations or add new ones.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Constructor, no idea why it is here (all class members are static).

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddAlgorithm (Type algorithm, string[] names);
.method public static hidebysig void AddAlgorithm(class System.Type algorithm, string[] names) cil managed
public static void AddOID (string oid, string[] names);
.method public static hidebysig void AddOID(string oid, string[] names) cil managed
.method public static hidebysig object CreateFromName(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: Name of the cryptographic algorithm to create.
Docs.summary: Create the default cryptographic implementation for the specified algorithm name.
Docs.returns: An instance of the default implementation of the specified algorithm.
Docs.remarks: Default mapping can be modified, or added to, by modifying the machine.config file.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CreateFromName (string name, object[] args);

Docs.param: Name of the cryptographic algorithm to create.
Parameters to give to the class contructor.
Docs.summary: Create the default cryptographic implementation for the specified algorithm name.
Docs.returns: An instance of the default implementation of the specified algorithm.
Docs.remarks: Default mapping can be modified, or added to, by modifying the machine.config file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] EncodeOID(string str) cil managed

Docs.param: The OID string in dotted notation (e.g. "1.3.14.3.2.26").
Docs.summary: Convert the OID string (dotted notation) into an ASN.1 encoded OID.
Docs.returns: A byte array containing the ASN.1 encoded OID.

remarks.para: A will be thrown if a part of the OID is bigger than ..

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string MapNameToOID(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The algorithm name or class name (e.g. "SHA1").
Docs.summary: Return the name of the class that is mapped to the specified OID.
Docs.returns: The OID string in dotted notation (e.g. "1.3.14.3.2.26") for the specified algorithm.
Docs.remarks: Default mapping can be modified, or added to, by modifying the machine.config file.
